questions.text: Choose the correct form of verb: He ___ to school every day.
Choose the correct article: He is ___ honest man.
Choose the correct preposition: She is fond ___ music.
Choose the correct passive form: They play football.
Fill in the blank: If I were a bird, I ___ fly in the sky.
Choose the correct comparative form: Rina is ___ than Mina.
Choose the correct conjunction: I was tired ___ I went to bed early.
Choose the correct sentence in indirect speech: He said, 'I am tired.'
options: He said that he is tired.
He said that he was tired.
He said that I was tired.
